languages.text: Прыжок через варп прошел почти спокойно, не считая того, что многие члены команды доложили — они ощутили во сне, будто некто подошел и положил ладонь им на лоб. Затем ладонь будто бы нырнула сквозь кожу, сквозь череп, и ласковыми движениями навела порядок в мыслях.

The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.
languages.original_text: Прыжок через варп прошел почти спокойно, не считая того, что многие члены команды доложили — они ощутили во сне, будто некто подошел и положил ладонь им на лоб. Затем ладонь будто бы нырнула сквозь кожу, сквозь череп, и ласковыми движениями навела порядок в мыслях.

traits.locale_text: The warp jump went mostly smooth. However, many crew members report someone approaching them in their sleep and placing a hand on their forehead. The hand passed through their skin and bone, and then rearranged their throughts, making them more orderly.

The warp jump went mostly smooth. However, many crew members report someone approaching them in their sleep and placing a hand on their forehead. The hand passed through their skin and bone, and then rearranged their throughts, making them more orderly.

The warp jump went mostly smooth. However, many crew members report someone approaching them in their sleep and placing a hand on their forehead. It was as if the hand passed through their skin and bone, and rearranged their thoughts, making them more orderly.

The warp jump went mostly smooth. However, many crew members report someone approaching them in their sleep and placing a hand on their forehead. It was as if the hand passed through their skin and bone, and rearranged their thoughts, making them more orderly.

The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.

The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.

languages.text: 亚空间跳跃进行得很顺利，但有不少船员报告说，他们在睡觉的时候发生了诡异的事情。他们感觉到有人靠近了他们，将一只手放在他们的额头上。随后，那只手仿佛穿过了他们的皮肤与头骨，用温柔的动作将他们杂乱的思想整理得井然有序。
languages.original_text: The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间跳跃进行得很顺利，但有不少船员报告说，他们在睡觉的时候发生了诡异的事情。他们感觉到有人靠近了他们，将一只手放在他们的额头上。随后，那只手仿佛穿过了他们的皮肤与头骨，用温柔的动作将他们杂乱的思想整理得井然有序。

languages.text: El salto de disformidad ha sido fluido, aunque muchos tripulantes informan de incidentes extraños mientras dormían. Sentían que alguien se les acercaba y apoyaba una mano en su frente. La mano parecía atravesar su piel y su cráneo y, con movimientos amables, ordenaba sus pensamientos revueltos para imponer algo de orden.
languages.original_text: The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.

traits.locale_text: El salto de disformidad ha sido fluido, aunque muchos tripulantes informan de incidentes extraños mientras dormían. Sentían que alguien se les acercaba y apoyaba una mano en su frente. La mano parecía atravesar su piel y su cráneo y, con movimientos amables, ordenaba sus pensamientos revueltos para imponer algo de orden.

languages.text: ワープジャンプはスムーズに終わったが、多くのクルーが、眠っている間の奇妙な出来事を報告した。何者かが近づいてきて、自分の額に手を置くのを感じたという。そして、その手は皮膚を通り越して頭蓋骨を抜け、優しく動いて混乱した頭を整理していったのだという。
languages.original_text: The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.

traits.locale_text: ワープジャンプはスムーズに終わったが、多くのクルーが、眠っている間の奇妙な出来事を報告した。何者かが近づいてきて、自分の額に手を置くのを感じたという。そして、その手は皮膚を通り越して頭蓋骨を抜け、優しく動いて混乱した頭を整理していったのだという。

languages.text: Der Warpsprung verlief relativ reibungslos, auch wenn viele Crewmitglieder von merkwürdigen Zwischenfällen während ihres Schlafs berichteten: Sie spürten, wie sich jemand näherte und ihnen eine Hand auf die Stirn legte. Dann schien die Hand durch ihre Haut hindurchzugleiten, durch ihren Schädel, und mit zarten Bewegungen ihre chaotischen Gedanken zu sortieren, ihnen eine gewisse Ordnung zu verleihen.
languages.original_text: The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.

traits.locale_text: Der Warpsprung verlief relativ reibungslos, auch wenn viele Crewmitglieder von merkwürdigen Zwischenfällen während ihres Schlafs berichteten: Sie spürten, wie sich jemand näherte und ihnen eine Hand auf die Stern legte. Dann schien die Hand durch ihre Haut hindurchzugleiten, durch ihren Schädel, und mit zarten Bewegungen ihre chaotischen Gedanken zu sortieren, ihnen eine gewisse Ordnung zu verleihen.

languages.text: Le saut Warp se déroula plutôt bien, même si de nombreux membres de l'équipage signalèrent d'étranges incidents survenus au cours de leur sommeil. Ils auraient senti quelqu'un les approcher et poser sa main sur leur front. La main aurait alors traversé leur peau jusqu'à leur crâne avant de doucement ordonner leurs pensées d'une certaine manière.
languages.original_text: The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.

traits.locale_text: Le saut Warp se déroula plutôt bien, même si de nombreux membres de l'équipage signalèrent d'étranges incidents survenus au cours de leur sommeil. Ils auraient senti quelqu'un les approcher et poser sa main sur leur front. La main aurait alors traversé leur peau jusqu'à leur crâne avant de doucement ordonner leurs pensées d'une certaine manière.

languages.text: Öteboyut sıçraması, olabildiğince sorunsuz geçti. Gelgelelim kimi tayfalar, uyurken garip olaylar yaşadıklarını bildirdi. Birinin onlara yaklaştığını ve alınlarına dokunduğunu hissetmişler. Onlara dokunan elin, sonrasında derilerinden ve kafataslarından geçerek yumuşak hareketlerle karmaşık düşüncelerini düzene soktuğunu söylediler.
languages.original_text: The warp jump went smoothly enough, although many crew members reported strange incidents while they were asleep — they sensed someone approaching them and laying a hand on their forehead. Then the hand seemed to pass through their skin, through their skull, and with tender motions, sorted their jumbled thoughts into some sort of order.
